long_description: From exploring a little surf town to hanging on the boardwalk, the girls' Reef Little Tropic shoes are sure to please. Soft, flexible and naturally breathable cotton canvas uppers feature a bold pattern, creating a fun style. Their feet will enjoy the pillowy comfort of the mattress-inspired quilted EVA footbeds, which offer plenty of cushioning underfoot. Shaped arches offer a touch of support. Rubber outsoles on the Reef Little Tropic shoes feature jute fiber inlays for naturally enhanced traction and style.
short_description: From exploring a little surf town to hanging on the boardwalk, the girls' Reef Little Tropic shoes are sure to please.
